document_data.mainbody: he River Lurlar was a river that may have formed part of the border between Cormyr and Sembia that flowed into the Neck between the Dragonmere and Sea of Fallen Stars.The River Lurlar is described as the border between Cormyr and Sembia in some publications, while the Darkflow River is stated to be the border in others. It is possible that this is an error or retcon, or that the border follows sections of both rivers.
